articles.content: Team Ninja and Koei Tecmo will officially launch The Nioh Collection, including Nioh and Nioh 2, on PS5 earlier next month. Along with that, Nioh 2 Complete Edition will also be available on PC on th… [+1620 chars]

articles.title: iPhone 12 Mini sales underwhelm, Pro models get a production boost: Reports - Pocketnow
articles.description: Sales of the iPhone 12 Mini have been lackluster primarily due to the pandemic hitting the core markets it was targeted at.
